name: Odric's Odyssey 1.0 Beta
description:
Our main site: https://sites.google.com/view/odrics-odyssey/home

Odric's Odyssey is 2D top-down RPG made in the Unity engine by The Kitchen. It will focus on Odirc, a young kobold who’s transformed himself into a dragon. Over time, he will defeat more and more powerful dragons, to unlock more and more aspects of the dragon, the games version of power-ups.

Current Progress:

  • Only 1 boss.
  • The map has only 1 room.
  • Full home menu and pause menu.
  • Completed audio effects, though may be changed.
  • Both a win and a loose screen.
  • The boss (with all 9 attacks), player, and goon are in a working condition, though may be unbalanced, buggy, and/or not graphically complete.
  • No upgrade or inventory system.
  • Boss is using a placeholder sprite (purple box).
  • Player's animations are only partly completed.

Known Bugs:

  • If fire disappears while the player is in it, the player will receive fire damage until player goes back in fire.
  • Player will occasionally walk in a direction until hitting an object.
  • Wave attack only hits once.
  • If a boss uses a movement based attack, while using one, the boss may freeze in one area.
